description.narrative: At a project-level, the most significant impact will be an increase in Argentina's renewable energy capacity and the displacement of approximately 168,500 metric tons of CO2 equivalent a year. The project will also contribute to employment and knowledge-transfer opportunities in local populations. At a market-level, the main impact derives from an enhancement of the competitiveness in the country's energy market through the increase of private sector participation in the RenovAr program which is expected to attract more than US$6 billion into a new renewable energy market. It will also contribute to the market's resiliency as the RenovAr Program is expected to diversify the energy matrix away from thermal fuel sources and large-scale hydro while also contributing to the exploitation of Argentina's abundant wind resources.

La Genoveva wind project (the Project) consists in the construction, operation and maintenance of an 88.2 MW wind farm. The Project is expected to have 21 individual 4.2MW wind turbines and will include the construction of a 33/132kV substation to connect the Project to the Coronel PringlesBahia Blanca Transmission Line (located in front of the Project). The Project was awarded a 20-year PPA with CAMMESA under the RenovAr 2.0 auction, with a tariff of US$40.9/MWh, it is the third project awarded to Central Puerto S.A. (CP or the Sponsor) in the RenovAr auctions.

mailing-address.narrative: Central Puerto Ruben Vazquez Gerente de Energias Renovables +54 11 4317-5000 ruben.vazquez@centralpuerto.com Av. Tomas Alva Edison 2701, Dársena E Puerto de Buenos Aires, Buenos Aires, Argentina. https://www.centralpuerto.com/en/

name.narrative: The Project will be developed in a rural, greenfield site on which the Company has an usufruct with existing private landowners. The site is located 30km northwest of the city of Bahia Blanca, in the province of Buenos Aires.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.

sector.narrative: V-BC - Wind Power - Renewable Energy Generation

title.narrative: Summary of Investment Information - Anticipated Impact Measurement & Monitoring (AIMM) Assessment and Main Environmental & Social Risks and Impacts of the Project
